meanings.sent1: We will arrive at the park before noon.
meanings.sent2: The train is scheduled to arrive at 3:00 PM.
meanings.sent3: I hope we arrive at the party before the cake is gone!
meanings.sent4: The idea suddenly arrived in my mind like a lightning bolt.
meanings.sent5: The package will arrive on your doorstep tomorrow.

meanings.sent1: The guests will arrive at the hotel shortly.
meanings.sent2: When will you arrive at the airport?
meanings.sent3: The pizza delivery guy always arrives just in time for dinner.
meanings.sent4: The news of the victory arrived like a refreshing breeze.

meanings.sent1: With hard work, you will arrive at success.
meanings.sent2: She arrived at a decision after much contemplation.
meanings.sent3: The detective arrived at the truth after solving the case.
meanings.sent4: After years of training, he finally arrived at his dream job.
